attributes.action: Make sure Gemma Collins does NOT get paid for Im a Celebrity: Get me out of here. Instead, donate the money to Poppy Appeal.
attributes.additional_details: By signing this, you will ensure Gemma Collins will NOT be paid for Im a Celebrity: Get me out of here. The rules of the show state, if a Celebrity stays in the jungle for 72 hours, they will get paid in full, this means Collins has adhered to the rules, and will therefore be paid. This is undeserved, and therefore the money should be paid to a charty, and I believe that charity should be Poppy Appeal. Thank you everyone who signs.
